metadata.title: CVE-2023-1264 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1392.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1264` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-athena - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-motif - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-nox - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
xxd - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.note: 0xnishit> get_cmdline_info() doesnt exist before focal release, so fixing this issue will be intrusive in bionic and before bionic relases.

criterions.comment: vim package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.2').
